title: cancel_job/
description: Schema describing parameters for canceling an ongoing job run.

username.title: Username
username.description: User account ID. Required for authentication if the data was originally imported by a valid user.

key.title: Authentication Key
key.description: Base64-encoded decryption key for the user account's public key. Required if 'username' is provided.

job_hash.title: Job Hash
job_hash.description: UUID associated with the data that should be cancelled.
